backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining Veda and language enums, mantra metadata, translations, audio storage, and query methods for retrieving mantra numbers and meanings.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing required frontend changes related to Samaveda mantra 47 visibility and initial default selections.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files, their roles, and recent dropdown and diagnostic-related changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining light and dark theme color tokens and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/_redirects: Redirect rule sending all paths to index.html for SPA routing.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA-friendly 404 page that redirects all unknown routes back to the app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing Veda, mantra, and language selections, deep-linking, auto-selection logic, diagnostics, and rendering mantra content.
frontend/src/components/MantraAudioSecti: Component for playing or uploading mantra audio, with authentication checks and upload progress handling.
frontend/src/components/MantraMetadataHe: Component that displays metadata text, visually emphasizing tokens ending with colons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that manages creation of authenticated or anonymous backend actors and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, wrapping AuthClient creation and exposing identity state and login helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching mantra numbers, meaning, text, metadata, and audio from the backend actor with caching and validation logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables plus utility and component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/selectValueGuards.ts: Provides helpers to validate select values and ensure bigint selections are valid.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, components, and theming using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, known issues, and feature requests related to fixing missing mantra 47 and dropdown behaviors.
